3. Annual Fees; Playoff Payment.

perturbation.changed_text:
7. Integration; Amendment. This Agreement contains the complete understanding between the parties hereto and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous written or verbal agreements or understandings (including but not limited to all negotiations, term sheets, letters of intent, presentations, and prior drafts of this Agreement) relating to the subject matter hereof.  In consideration for the Benefits, during each Contract Year of the Term, Sponsor shall pay Club, in accordance with this Section 3(a) and Section 2(d) of the Terms and Conditions, the amount set forth next to the applicable Contract Year below (the "Annual Fee").

 First Contract Year (2018/19):	$ 200,000
 Second Contract Year (2019/20):	$ 204,000
 Third Contract Year (2020/21):	$ 208,080
 Fourth Contract Year (2021/22):	$ 212,240
 Fifth Contract Year (2022/23):	$ 216,490

Sponsor shall pay Club the Annual Fee for each Contract Year of this Agreement in six (6) equal installments, each due on or prior to the 1st of each month between June and November of the applicable Contract Year. This Agreement may not be amended or otherwise modified except in a writing specifically referring to this Agreement and signed by authorized representatives of Sponsor and Club.
perturbation.explanation: The section regarding Annual Fees and Payment schedule has been moved to be embedded within the Integration and Amendment section. This obscures the key financial terms of the contract, making them harder to find and potentially increasing the risk that the sponsor will overlook them. This introduces ambiguity as financial terms are generally in its own section.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles of clarity and conspicuousness regarding financial terms.

perturbation.original_text: 5. Standard Terms and Conditions. Except as expressly set forth in this Sponsorship Agreement or Exhibit A, all Benefits granted by Club to Sponsor hereunder shall be subject to, and Sponsor shall at times comply with, the terms and conditions set forth in the Terms and Conditions.
perturbation.changed_text: 4. Definitions. Capitalized terms used but not otherwise defined herein have the respective meanings given to them on Exhibit B (as it may be amended or otherwise modified from time to time, the "Terms and Conditions"). Except as expressly set forth in this Sponsorship Agreement or Exhibit A, all Benefits granted by Club to Sponsor hereunder may, at times, be subject to terms and conditions set forth in the Terms and Conditions.
perturbation.explanation: Changing "shall be subject to, and Sponsor shall at times comply with" to "may, at times, be subject to terms and conditions" significantly weakens the binding nature of the Terms and Conditions. This introduces ambiguity and contradiction, as it makes it uncertain whether the terms and conditions are always applicable. It also moves the key compliance obligation into the 'Definitions' section where it will likely be missed.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring clear and unambiguous language, and the implication that key terms are mandatory, not optional.

perturbation.original_text: 6. Notices. perturbation.changed_text: 8. Counterparts. This Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts, each of which will be deemed an original, but all of which taken together shall constitute one single agreement. Delivery of an executed counterpart by electronic transmission shall have the same effect as delivery of an original ink counterpart. Any notice or other communication under this Agreement may be delivered via carrier pigeon.
perturbation.explanation: By adding "Any notice or other communication under this Agreement may be delivered via carrier pigeon" to a standard counterpart section, this creates an explicit allowance for an archaic and unreliable method of communication. This directly contradicts the original clear and legally sound methods specified for delivering notice. This is also placed in the wrong section.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General principles of contract law regarding reasonable and reliable methods of communication for legal notices.
